channel.title: SoulShark (My band)
channel.description:
A good day to you.
I've come today to bring you SoulShark.
[b]Who are we?[/b] SoulShark is a Belgian metalband. Don't mind the lack of vocals for now, we are looking for a singer! We try to find the perfect mix between power metal, speed metal, alternative & hardrock.
[b]Music?[/b] Yes, we have our demo uploaded @ www.myspace.com/soulsharkmusic
[b]Contact?[/b] You're free to add me on MSN : Maindropmusic@hotmail.com Or leave a message @ myspace!
Yours sincerely
Jens

item.title: SoulShark (My band)
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:5, topic:209580”]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9rwBp1l8Tjc

At around 0:35, its not exactly the same but it sounds like it.[/quote]Yep, it’s actually freaky…[quote=“Not X A Alex, post:6, topic:209580”]i actually like it…its not really that metal though[/quote]We are still looking for a good singer. So with voice it will be called metal
Grtz[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 02-07-2008, 09:30:50[/size][hr]NEW SONG ONLINE![br][br][size=1]Posted on: 10-08-2008, 14:47:34[/size][hr]Vocal tryout online!
